content: Felipe Farias is a professor of artificial intelligence at IFPE. His research interests include Machine Learning, Computational Intelligence, Natural Language Processing. He participate in BRAINS - Brazilian Research in Artificial Intelligence and Systems group, which develops intelligent algorithms to solve complex problems.
